cars.description: This is an immaculate 2006 Nissan Rogue with only 25000 miles on it. Leather seats, power everything.
This is an immaculate 2008 BMW 530i with only 20000 miles on it. Leather seats, power everything.
This is an immaculate 2008 Nissan Altima with only 25000 miles on it. Leather seats, power everything.
